TopicTitle: How do we transfer Kerbals between 2 pods without EVA?

Articles.Content:
I had two Kerbals on EVA and had them enter the two different pods... but now they're in the same one.  Not the result desired.

How do I get one to go to the other?
Near the bottom right corner you will see a button to open Kerbal Manager, where you can drag Kerbals between pods.
